data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Bukhoro hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bukhoro, Uzbekistan

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Bukhoro, Uzbekistan that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Bukhoro, Uzbekistan.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Bukhoro to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 2,766 believers in the state of Bukhoro with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Kyrgyz people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Bukhoro, Uzbekistan.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Bukhoro, Uzbekistan the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Bukhoro, Uzbekistan.

location.name: Bukhoro
location.cities_list: Bukhara, Türkmenabat, Kogon Shahri, G’ijduvon Shahri, Shofirkon Shahri
